pma:database.name: pix_db
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `exifinfo` ( `imageID` int(11) NOT NULL, `creationDate` date NOT NULL, `dimension` int(11) NOT NULL, `size` int(11) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `tags` varchar(30) NOT NULL, KEY `imageID` (`imageID`), CONSTRAINT `exifinfo_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`imageID`) REFERENCES `images` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `images` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `userID` int(11) NOT NULL, `localPath` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `userID` (`userID`), CONSTRAINT `images_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`userID`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
